name: wallee Subscription
author: wallee AG

sections.description:
This plugin adds support to process WooCommerce Subscription with wallee.

Customer behavior and desires in terms of product consumption have changed in the digital age.
They’re looking for new ways to engage with businesses. Consumers today have a new set of expectations.
They want outcomes, not ownership.

Please note this plugin enhances the features of the basic wallee Payment Plugin.
Therefore, it is necessary that you install the this plugin as well.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • PHP version 5.6 or greater
  • WordPress 4.4 or greater
  • WooCommerce 3.0.0 or greater
  • wallee Plugin 1.2.4 or later
  • Woocommerce Subscriptions Plugin 2.5 or later

Automatic installation

  1. Install the plugin via Plugins -> New plugin. Search for ‘wallee Subscription ‘.
  2. Activate the ‘wallee Subscription’ plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You’re done. You can now process subscriptions through wallee.

Manual installation

  1. Unpack the downloaded package.
  2. Upload the directory ‘woo-wallee-subscription’ to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the ‘wallee Subscription’ plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. You’re done. You can now process subscriptions through wallee.
sections.changelog:
1.1.3 – December 6, 2023

  • [BugFix] Allow changing payment method for active subscriptions with latest woo-subscriptions
